name: STEM Ambassadors
description: Volunteers from a wide range of science, technology, engineering and mathematics related jobs across the UK.
role-long: Passionate about inspiring the next generation! Through volunteering, I introduce children to the world of software engineering—helping them discover their potential in a field that offers both meaningful work and financial stability. My goal is to spark curiosity, build confidence, and show them that a rewarding tech career could be within their reach.

name: Repair Café
role-long: Committed to sustainability and community support! As a volunteer fixer, I help repair electrical devices for free, reducing landfill waste and promoting a circular economy.
By extending the life of everyday items, I contribute to a greener environment while supporting people in my community.
